Seer Skahi: I've come here on the webs of time and space weaved by the Duda-Mara Totem Spirit! Many signs point to an imminent eternal winter. I'm very concerned about the future of our tribe. Dear young man! Do you have the strength to endure an eternal winter? [npc_%objectId%_SkillList|Learn Skills] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
